perturbation.original_text:
Any notice or other communication under this Agreement shall be in writing and shall be considered given when delivered
personally or by electronic mail (confirmed by one of the other permissible methods of giving notice hereunder), one business day after being sent
by a nationally recognized overnight courier, or three business days after being mailed by registered or certified mail, postage prepaid and return
receipt requested, to the parties at the following addresses (or at such other address as a party may specify by notice to the other):

To Sponsor:
The ARC Group, Inc.
perturbation.changed_text:
Any notice or other communication under this Agreement shall be in writing to the parties at the following addresses (or at such other address as a party may specify by notice to the other):

To Sponsor:
The ARC Group, Inc.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the language regarding electronic mail, overnight courier, and certified mail, and only providing that notice should be in writing, the clause becomes less clear in whether those methods can be used to serve a notice, and creates a legal contradiction with standard contract law, making it difficult to enforce the means of communicating between involved parties.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Sufficiency of Notice

perturbation.original_text:
Term”) shall commence as of April 1, 2018 (the “Effective Date”) and shall expire upon the later of: (a) the conclusion of the 2022/23 NFL season
and (b) the last day in February, 2023 (such expiration date, the “Scheduled Expiration Date”), unless sooner terminated pursuant to the terms of
this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Term”) shall commence as of April 1, 2018 (the “Effective Date”) and shall expire upon the later of: (a) the conclusion of the 2022/23 NFL season
and (b) the last day in February, 2023 (such expiration date, the “Scheduled Expiration Date”).
perturbation.explanation: By removing the text stating 'unless sooner terminated pursuant to the terms of this agreement', it creates a contradiction regarding how the contract can be terminated, making it difficult to enforce the full term of the contract.

perturbation.original_text:
This Agreement contains the complete understanding between the parties hereto and supersedes all prior and
contemporaneous written or verbal agreements or understandings (including but not limited to all negotiations, term sheets, letters of intent,
presentations, and prior drafts of this Agreement) relating to the subject matter hereof. This Agreement may not be amended or otherwise modified
except in a writing specifically referring to this Agreement and signed by authorized representatives of Sponsor and Club.
perturbation.changed_text:
This Agreement contains the complete understanding between the parties hereto and supersedes all prior and
contemporaneous written or verbal agreements or understandings relating to the subject matter hereof. This Agreement may not be amended or otherwise modified
except in a writing signed by authorized representatives of Sponsor and Club.
perturbation.explanation: By omitting the statement of 'specifically referring to this agreement', it creates a legal contradiction by changing the enforceability of future amendments to the agreement. Enforceability of any future amendments becomes unclear if they are not referencing the agreement.
